text: Yvonne Delcour pseudonym of Yvonne Verschueren (8 May 1932 â€“ 20 August 2024) was a Belgian television and stage actress. She was born in Ghent, Belgium. Delcour was most known for playing Adrie in . She also had other rules such as a guest role in television series De Collega's and in the 2008 movie Moscow, Belgium. After her first marriage, she married theater director . They also played together in the theater. Delcour died on 20 August 2024 at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Belgian television actors Category:Belgian movie actors Category:Belgian stage actors
